movie.title: Marriage Killer
movie.description_intro: Robert and Morgan (40's) have been married for 20 years. They have a teen daughter, beautiful home, self employed, nice cars and great friends. Everything they have ever wanted, except that after all these years, their sex life is idle. Until they decide to join a members only private club, where they meet ISABELLE; a beautiful, sexy, edgy and manipulative woman who is not afraid to express her attraction towards married couples. Unbeknownst to them, Robert and Morgan embark on a journey that will test their marriage to the limit and threaten to loose everything they have ever worked for - including their lives.
movie.description_full: Robert and Morgan (40's) have been married for 20 years. They have a teen daughter, beautiful home, self employed, nice cars and great friends. Everything they have ever wanted, except that after all these years, their sex life is idle. Until they decide to join a members only private club, where they meet ISABELLE; a beautiful, sexy, edgy and manipulative woman who is not afraid to express her attraction towards married couples. Unbeknownst to them, Robert and Morgan embark on a journey that will test their marriage to the limit and threaten to loose everything they have ever worked for - including their lives.

movies.title: Labour of Love
movies.summary: An amateur racing team consists of motorsport enthusiasts from every inhabited continent of the world decided to take on one of the toughest endurance races on the planet, the Dubai 24 Hours.
movies.description_full: An amateur racing team consists of motorsport enthusiasts from every inhabited continent of the world decided to take on one of the toughest endurance races on the planet, the Dubai 24 Hours.
movies.synopsis: An amateur racing team consists of motorsport enthusiasts from every inhabited continent of the world decided to take on one of the toughest endurance races on the planet, the Dubai 24 Hours.

movies.title: The Intervention
movies.summary: A young couple, Peter and Ruby, are married with three children. On a weekend trip a tight-knit group of friends confront them about their constant bickering and propose they divorce. Reacting in anger, the couple clearly realize the truth in what their friends are trying to say; nonetheless, they remember their old feelings for each other and decide instead to strive to improve their relationship. Later, the intervention is turned around on Annie (Lynskey) and her alcohol problem, while she begins to realize that her conspired marriage intervention for Ruby and Peter may have been based on her suppressed doubts about her own impending wedding.

movies.title: Life of the Party
movies.summary: When her husband suddenly dumps her, longtime dedicated housewife Deanna turns regret into re-set by going back to college - landing in the same class and school as her daughter, who's not entirely sold on the idea. Plunging headlong into the campus experience, the increasingly outspoken Deanna -- now Dee Rock -- embraces freedom, fun, and frat boys on her own terms, finding her true self in a senior year no one ever expected.

movies.title: Secret Santa
movies.summary: Christmas dinner brings tidings of death when someone enacts revenge, and out of the bloody madness rises a hero who must face all odds to stop an outbreak before it's too late.
movies.description_full: Christmas dinner brings tidings of death when someone enacts revenge, and out of the bloody madness rises a hero who must face all odds to stop an outbreak before it's too late.
